about.p: CityNix is a company of business savvy programmers and business application architects with a passion for solving difficult business problems using state-of-the-art, open source solutions. With these tools, CityNix can help small and medium sized businesses streamline their business processes and architectures in ways that were previously only available to large businesses. Whether a client needs smooth and easy data backup, enterprise resource planning or custom, client-specific programs, CityNix will deliver the solution on schedule.

Our team of highly skilled individuals have the drive to solve even the toughest problems. We welcome clients to push our knowledge and request solutions to things not featured in our profile. If there is a solution, we believe we can build it, and we would love the challenge.
